required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of mRNA-3745 in Participants With Glycogen Storage Disease Type 1a (GSD1a)
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label Dose-Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of mRNA-3745 in Participants With Glycogen Storage Disease Type 1a (GSD1a)

brief_summary.textblock: The main goal of this trial is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of mRNA-3745 via intravenous (IV) administration in participants with GSD1a.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a dose escalation study in adult participants with GSD1a to determine the safety and tolerability of mRNA-3745 and characterize the pharmacokinetic (PK) and pharmacodynamic (PD) response following IV administration of a single dose of mRNA-3745.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With No Hypoglycemic Events for up to 8 Hours During Fasting Challenges
secondary_outcome.description: Hypoglycemia is defined as blood glucose <60 milligrams (mg)/deciliter (dL) (3.3 millimoles [mmol]/liter [L]).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline of Area Under the Effect Curve (AUEC) of Blood Glucose and Lactate During Fasting Challenges
Change From Baseline in Time to Hypoglycemia During Fasting Challenges
Change From Baseline in Maximum Effect (Emax) During Fasting Challenges
Maximum Observed Serum Concentration (Cmax) of mRNA and LNP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-infusion, at mid-infusion, and at the end of infusion (EOI) on Day 1 up to Week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Cmax of mRNA and LNP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-infusion, at mid-infusion, and at EOI on Day 1 up to Week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Serum Concentration-Time Curve From Time 0 to the Time of the Last Measurable Serum Concentration (AUC0-t) of mRNA and LNP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-infusion, at mid-infusion, and at EOI on Day 1 up to Week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal Elimination Half-Life (t1/2) of mRNA and LNP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-infusion, at mid-infusion, and at EOI on Day 1 up to Week 52
Pre-infusion, at mid-infusion, and at EOI on Day 1 up to Week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State of mRNA and LNP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-infusion, at mid-infusion, and at EOI on Day 1 up to Week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Metabolic Biomarkers

arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single IV dose of mRNA-3745 on Day 1.

intervention.description: Sterile frozen liquid dispersion for injection

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Documented GSD1a with confirmation by genetic testing
- Documented history of â‰¥1 hypoglycemic event with blood glucose <60 milligrams/deciliter (mg/dL) (<3.3 millimoles/liter [mmol/L]) and symptoms of hypoglycemia in the absence of acute illness, with at least one such event in the 4 weeks before signing the Informed Consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Liver transplant, including hepatocyte cell therapy/transplant
- Received gene therapy for GSD1a
- Presence of liver adenoma >5 centimeters (cm) in size
- Presence of liver adenoma with growth of >2 cm or >5 newly diagnosed liver adenoma, in the previous 2 years.
Note: Additional inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply, per protocol.

reference.citation: Cao J, Choi M, Guadagnin E, Soty M, Silva M, Verzieux V, Weisser E, Markel A, Zhuo J, Liang S, Yin L, Frassetto A, Graham AR, Burke K, Ketova T, Mihai C, Zalinger Z, Levy B, Besin G, Wolfrom M, Tran B, Tunkey C, Owen E, Sarkis J, Dousis A, Presnyak V, Pepin C, Zheng W, Ci L, Hard M, Miracco E, Rice L, Nguyen V, Zimmer M, Rajarajacholan U, Finn PF, Mithieux G, Rajas F, Martini PGV, Giangrande PH. mRNA therapy restores euglycemia and prevents liver tumors in murine model of glycogen storage disease. Nat Commun. 2021 May 25;12(1):3090. doi: 10.1038/s41467-021-23318-2.
